intro: Sibthorpia prostrata, commonly known as the prostrate sibthorpia, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Malvaceae. It is a low-growing, mat-forming shrub that typically thrives in arid and semi-arid environments. The plant features small, woolly leaves and produces yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. It is native to regions of Africa, particularly in southern and eastern parts of the continent. Sibthorpia prostrata is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
